name: BvA: It's Snow Joke
description:
A festive arcade shooter for your Classic Amiga.
(Original game not required!)

THE STORY SO FAR ...

Help save Christmas from Mr Freeze and foes in this exclusive single level episode of Bean Versus The Animator : It's Snow Joke!

FEATURING ...
  • A Snowy Graveyard
  • A Big Boss Fight
  • 3 Types of Weapons
  • 1 or 2 Player (Simultaneous) Action
  • 32 Colours
  • 8 Bit SFX and Music.
  • Jingles and Santa Hats!
  • Lightgun or Mouse Controls
  • Single Floppy Disk  - No Disk Swaps!
  • Holiday fun!
REQUIREMENTS ...
  • OCS / ECS or AGA Amiga
    • This game will also run under emulation on Windows, Linux or Mac using FS-UAE or WINUAE and official Amiga ROMS.
  • Kickstart 2.04 and above (Tested on 2.04 and 3.1)
  • 1 MB Chip Ram Amiga. A stock A500+ will do!
    • Recommended 1.5MB overall if running from Workbench
  • Single Bootable Disk Image
  • Mouse or Lightgun
  • Sega Light Phaser 3050 with Amiga adapter and CRT has been used in testing.
  • A Modern light gun controller under emulation, such as the Sinden (tested under WinUAE).
FULL GAME ...

Available to download on itch.io here: Bean Versus The Animator
